tasks.label: Desplegar y arrancar MantenimientosBackend
args: mvn clean package -DskipTests -q; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { docker exec tomee-server rm -rf /usr/local/tomee/webapps/MantenimientosBackend /usr/local/tomee/webapps/MantenimientosBackend.war; docker cp target/MantenimientosBackend.war tomee-server:/usr/local/tomee/webapps/; docker restart tomee-server; Start-Sleep 12; docker logs tomee-server --tail 20 } else { Write-Host 'Error compilacion' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: Iniciar Backend (primera vez)
args: Write-Host 'Compilando proyecto...' -ForegroundColor Green; mvn clean package -DskipTests -q; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host 'Iniciando TomEE...' -ForegroundColor Green; $env:TOMEE_PORT='8081'; docker-compose up --build -d; Start-Sleep 10; Write-Host 'Backend disponible en http://localhost:8081/MantenimientosBackend/' -ForegroundColor Green; docker logs tomee-server --tail 15 } else { Write-Host 'Error en compilaci√≥n' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: Reiniciar Solo TomEE
args: docker restart tomee-server; Start-Sleep 5; docker logs tomee-server --tail 10
